name: Cycling to Tay Tuu flower field & Dong Ngac ancient village
description:
It’s a different
cycling tour hand-picked by VietnamCheapPackages team and never sold by other
companies. Enjoy your 6-hour cycling in Hanoi’s largest flower fields of Tay
Tuu then visit Dong Ngac cultural village with ancient houses of Nguyen, Do,
Pham families. Enjoy traditional Vietnamese lunch in 1 of these ancient houses.
